description:
This stand has a spring loaded arm that lets you easily dock your bike. Roll it into the wheel slot, hands-free. A stylish way to store or display your ride, and it won't scratch the rim or spokes.

  • Holds front or rear wheel
  • Accommodates wheels from 20–29in. and 20mm road tires or 2.4in mountain bike tires
  • Base footprint is 343x 406mm
  • Folded height is 81mm
  • Modular design supports multiple RAKKs connected together in a row
name: Feedback Sports RAKK Bicycle Stand
